reviews.review:
CS:S è a mio avviso il miglior FPS tattico mai creato.
La veste grafica è stata molto migliorata rispetto al suo predecessore CS 1.6 così da renderlo molto più apprezzabile senza modificarne il gameplay. 
E' essenziale nelle caratteristiche, ma è un gioco di mira e abilità, non alla portata di tutti.
Un must have per gli amanti degli FPS che hanno bisogno di un elevato tasso di sfida.
Da sottolineare la grandissima mole di MOD, minigame e supporto del Workshop.
its okay, the original was better
Probably the best FPS game ever made. Prove me wrong.
et virkelig skønt og delijge spil at spil sammen med venner jeg synes alle skulle have dettte spil :)
оно того стоит! ГО, Я создал!!!

CS: Source for me is widly considered to be the most Critical Acclaimed Online Shooter next to TF2. Fun gameplay, fast paced action, interesting maps and other great stuff easily makes this game fun and enjoyable. And yeah it was released when CoD was around but CS was made BEFORE CoD just to let you know. I recommend you get this game with Garry's Mod for some more whacked out...well stuff. Also, becareful for team flashing.
Seven hundred hours on this account, more than that on the old one. Where has the time gone? It wasn't wasted, probably...
всем советую отличное продолжение легендарного онлайн FPS...теперь уже от самих Valve...кстати все ошибки Condition Zero исправлены. 10/10
Fast pace as long as you are in Crack House.  Eat my P90 fools!
was good but its full of hackers and laggy basterds now

Verdadeiro classico do FPS, tem varios tipos de modos de jogo.
Me diverti muito com ele cheguei até 500 horas de jogo, e recomendo muito a comprar esse jogo.

CS脑残粉强烈推荐第二弹！！！
PS：抄袭CF！
Je joue a CounterStrike:Source, c'est une raison suffisante pour l'acheter.
Avarage PC shooters that wants to get better in aiming and shitting here is the game for you! :P
aí galera o melhor jogo de tiro de todos os tempos...
Wieso habe ich so viel Zeit mit diesem Spiel verschwendet?
Counter-Strike: Source - лучший командный шутер от первого лица.
The core of all FPS game lies within this game.

Counter Strike:Source ist ein sehr ansprechender Taktik Shooter, welcher nicht nur darauf abziehlt möglichst hohe Killstreaks zu erlangen, sondern auch ein gewisses Team-Spiel vorschreibt, was das Spiel zu einem einzigartigen MUST HAVE Titel macht. Ich bin sehr überzeugt von dem Spiel und denke, das jede Person die Shooter mag, dieses Spiel gern spielen wird und kann es auch daher guten Gewissens empfehlen.

Ce jeu est vraiment genial je vous le recommande vivement ;)
De bonne base avec pas mal de bon stress ( surtout sur les map officielle ) qui fait asser bien marrer.
+ SI VOUS JOUER ENTRE POTE OU SUR UN SERVEUR AVEC UNE BONNE AMBIANCE ,  jE VOUS LE DIS C'EST L'ECLATE TOTAL ET Y'AURAIS PAS MIEUX COMME JEU DANS C'EST CONDITIONS . 
PS:  Penser a l'acheter pour me rejoindre qu'on se tape de bon gros delire ! :P

Counter Strike is the world's most famous shooter game ever. This game is same than others, except it has the Source-engine and some new weapons. There are thousands of custom maps. From Gungame to Jailbreak. CSS is really fun compared to it's price. There are thousands of servers all the time all over the world. I recommend everyone to buy this game, because it's a huge classic. I would give it 8/10.
Bon gros vieux FPS pure qui prend pas une ride!
lets face roll some bitches together
One of the best games ever!

Been playing this since November 2004, it came with my Half Life 2. Know everything there is to know about the game. Even after the much hated update of summer 2010.. it still is going strong. Still remember my first ever game of it. I only really play now to maintain my skill of it.. which is up there.

Personally I'm not a fan of the respawn system. Starting off playing this game you will spend more time watching two or three people standing off than actually playing the game. The game does get enjoyable once you come up with a strategy to use yourself. A better buy than Global Offensive.
még most is a legjobb fps
Eins der Besten Shooter die es auf der Erde gibt ! TOP !

"Counter Strike" is a long standing game that has defined video gaming's largest genre for over 14 years. Truly no cooking simulator has ever lived up to the standards  of counter strike players. Everything from the famous "knife duels" where players try and chop up sticks of celery faster than their opponents to the little things like running around the kitchen faster while holding a lighter vegetable or a leaner cut of meat. This game has no nonsense. Even the title get's right down to business. "Counter Strike". And boy do you strike counters a whole lot when you get to endurance mode where you have to strike the counter faster and more precise than your opponent for three and a half hours to make the perfect guacamole for the Argentinian Ambassador. No idea why they have "Source" in there though. Beats me.
Classic. sould be in everyone's game list.  If not for the usual t's vs  ct's action of the orignial CS, then for the excellent carnage brought in from other games types like gungame.
One of my favorite Source games. Would recommend CS:S for competitive players. Also, a huge improvement from 1.6.

I LOVE this game. I will never get tired of it. Probably one of the best online games ever!

С каждым обновлением игра становится все хуже и хуже. Не вижу смыса в переодическом изменении физики, в частности разброса, что заставляет каждый раз по-новому приспосабливаться к игре (в этом плане меня поймут только опытные игроки, которые не используют читы, левые конфиги и скрипты). Предпочитаю и всем советую играть в старую версию CS: Sourse v_34 (non steam).
